pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP2+
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo or faster
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: optional
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, 8, 7, Vista
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 6100, Intel X3000 or Radeon X1300
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
